article: saying he was concerned about a possible campaign to deceive the public on iraq , the top democrat on the senate intelligence committee asked the fbi on friday to investigate forged documents that the united states had used as evidence against president saddam hussein .
abstract: rockefeller requests fbi investigation of forged iraq documents
